title: Track fault causing delays on North-South Line

title_translations.zh-Hans: 轨道故障导致南北线延误
title_translations.ms: Ralat trek menyebabkan kelewatan di Laluan Utara-Selatan
title_translations.ta: வடக்கு-தெற்கு பாதையில் தாமதத்தை ஏற்படுத்தும் தடயப் பிழை

updates.text: [NSL] CLEARED: Train services between #AngMoKio and #MarinaBay are now operating normally.
[NSL]: Estimate 10 mins additional traveling time between #AngMoKio and #MarinaBay in both directions due to track fault.
[NSL]: Estimate 10 mins additional travelling time between #AngMoKio and #MarinaBay in both directions due to track fault.
